divs: Sighting DetailsSeen 5 Lights following each other in line, the last one was higher and closer to the one in front. Going north then one by one turned to the east, dimmed and dissapeared. 1 minute latter a chopper whit his lights on came from the east and turned south (took about the same path) . No sound was heard. The sky was clear. Saw the same thing after a thunder storm 1 month earlier.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sorel
There were no other sightings in Sorel on or around August 24th 2013
